function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of airborne SARS-CoV-2 RNA in repurposed COVID-19 'surge ward'","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection in healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Ensure effective ventilation systems and air filtration devices are in place and regularly maintained","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration devices, ventilation systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, facility managers"},{"Description":"Impact on healthcare professional and patient-focused outcomes","Impact":"Potential harm to healthcare professionals and patients, including increased infection/exposure, noise, reduced ambient humidity, and impact on care delivery","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and assessment of air quality, noise levels, and environmental conditions; use of advanced air filtration devices with minimal impact on ambient humidity and noise levels","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration devices, environmental monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, facility managers"},{"Description":"Portable air filtration devices as a mitigation strategy for reduced availability of airborne infection isolation facilities","Impact":"Mitigates the reduced availability of isolation facilities in healthcare settings during surges of COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Deploy portable air filtration devices in high-risk areas, ensure regular maintenance and monitoring","Technologies":"Portable air filtration devices, monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, facility managers"}]}
